reviewText:
This DVD is a full length animated features, very fun for kids, suitable for age 6 and up. In the story, a new game show sends young Leo, Jackie, Margaret, and Alex to a remote island. There they will compete against each other in a survival challenge for a chance to win a million dollars. But on the way their plane crashes in an uncharted island, where they are forced to team up to survive. And by the way, there are dinosaurs. T-Rexes, Raptors, Pterodactyls and more dinosaurs are to be found on the island. This show is a fast paced action-adventure movie. This movie is one of those that parents or babysitting teens will not mind watching too. My 13 year old still likes it. Released in 2002 and it is 75 minutes long.

The same animation studio, "DIC", has released other titles to video and TV, such as animated versions of 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea, Treasure Island, Globehunters, Zorro, and Dinosaur Island. The last 2 titles are really good. They also made the Archie's movies and the Inspector Gadget. Extras on the disc are Inspector Gadget info and fun facts. DVD quality is good, picture and sound clean, no issues with freezing up or anything.
Bought it for my grandson (4 yrs old)along with 6 other movies and he requests that one first each time I ask him which dinosaur movie he wants to watch.
The actors are mislabeled on this Amazon.com product. This is a cartoon. It has nothing to do with what Michelle Bauer fans want.
great for tweens (even though I'm no tween). Thank you

I purchased this by accident. There is another movie with the same name that has become a sort of cult classic. I should have known by the cover art that it was not the movie I was looking for. My mistake. I did make a young lad happy by giving it to him for his enjoyment. He loved it, and watches it often, according to his mother.
My son absolutely loves dinosaurs.  He has watched this movie over & over again!  I would recommend it for anyone who has children that are wild about dinosaurs.

This is a cartoon full length movie. My 6yr old son likes this movie. It has 4 older kids that have to fight off dinos to survive. Its a good dino show for kids, alittle slow for adults that want something to watch with their kid.
every kid love dinosaurs. this movie is a great gift for any kid. the movie work great with no problems!
My boys both like Dinosaurs so I thought I would give this movie a try.  They both like it very much.

I get the fun part of it all. Finding the entertainmaent that will keep entertaining my child. So, the big thing now in my household has been dinosaurs. I only thought this would be a phase that would come to an end quickly. But I was wrong. Why? was I wrong because not only are the dinosaurs entertaing, but they have names, and they are very exciting. It allows the ability to learn and enjoy while learning. Then, the dinosaurs enter the home they are leave eaters, or meat eaters, and sometimes both. Then there are days they growl, and then there are days were the creativity, and thought towards it all becomes more than a thought. Because I hear hey, can you find me another movie like that-it was so cool, I like it better than the last one(which of course has to be watched again). Oh sure, I say I will do the best I can. The movie is great, and your child would like it alot just like mine has.
Again, another one for our grandsons, & they truly love it, because it's all about dinosaurs!!
